name: Bear Adventures
description:
Bear Adventures is a 3D platformer with 20 exciting tropical levels and unique graphics!
You can play alone or invite your friends, because in Bear Adventures the co-op mode of the game supports up to 4 players !!

You are a bear! Weird bear beekeeper! Your enemies have decided to destroy your honey empire!
Embark on a journey to retrieve the stolen honey and punish them! You have to overcome all the trials
and return the stolen honey in order to restore their production.
Do not relax, you are always in danger! Attack enemies, search and collect honey along the way with your friends!
- use your jumping skill because this game has unique jumping mechanics!
-attack with a blow "Pinwheel"
- cut down trees, bushes.
-Kill giant spiders and hungry tigers!
-Pass levels against the clock, and set your records.

Levels in complete darkness where: the only source of light is a torch, but it does not shine for long, you need to overcome obstacles on the level, find the next torch to reach the finish line.
Wild horse: saddle him, but he hardly obeys you, goes without stopping, you can only make him run and jump to overcome obstacles, otherwise he will throw you off and you will not fall on the stakes!
Rolling Stone: a difficult level where you have to run away from a stone that is rolling right at you! On the way, you will be attacked by animals, trees, which will prevent you from passing until you cut them down or jump over.
Honey harvesting level! You need to find and deftly collect all the honey that can be hidden, otherwise the portal will not let you to the next level.
